Privacy Policy

Last Updated: [Date]

1. Information We Collect
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.

2. How We Use Your Information
We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

3. Information Sharing
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent.

4. Data Security
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.

5. Your Rights
You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time.

6. Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@example.com.

en:
We'd love to hear from you!

If you have any questions, feedback, or need support, please reach out to us via email.
Choose a challenge difficulty that suits you
Select symbol to start your first round
Select symbol to increase its appearance probability

No settlement logs yet
Logs will appear after rolling dice
Swipe left/right to view different goblins
Are you sure you want to exit the current game and return to the home screen?
Long ago, the various civilized forces in the world had been entangled in conflicts for hundreds of years, never ceasing.
But one day, an alien civilization invaded this world. They ruthlessly wiped out the civilizations that had existed for thousands of years, leaving nothing behind.
All races were also turned into symbols by alien rays and buried deep underground.
After the war, the goblins living in the caves escaped the disaster. By the time they realized what had happened, they were the only remaining race in the world.
All hope rests on the goblins. They have decided to dig up all the symbols from underground to save the living beings and gain more gold coins to rebuild civilization.
Click here to take control of the goblins for digging expeditionsâ€”unearth more symbols, form more bonds, and earn more gold coins!
Click here to browse the diverse array of goods. You can get plenty of useful items for your digging endeavors!
Click here to log in and check in daily. A huge number of rewards will be given to you for free!
Sign in daily to claim amazing rewards!
Come back tomorrow for more rewards!
A brave warrior who earns extra coins for each symbol eliminated
Extra symbol choice opportunity each round
A skilled craftsman who provides extra symbol choice opportunities each round
A lucky gambler who doubles the probability of finding dice
A noble king whose soldiers create wealth for him
Randomly fill 1 magic bag before mining each round
A mysterious wizard who fills magic bags before mining each round
Remove the symbol with the highest rarity among all <color=#E74875>#Materials</color>, and gain gold coins equal to its base value + 50
For each <color=#E74875>#Alien</color> symbol in the symbol pool, lose 5 gold coins; for each <color=#E74875>#Monster</color> symbol, gain 20 gold coins
Obtain 5 random <color=#E74875>#Humans</color> symbols and gain 10 gold coins
Remove all <color=#147ED9>Dark Moon Sprites</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per sprite eliminated
Remove all <color=#147ED9>Starlight Sprites</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per sprite eliminated
Remove all <color=#147ED9>Forest Sprites</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per sprite eliminated
Obtain 3 random <color=#E74875>#Human</color> symbols. Remove all <color=#E74875>#Monsters</color> from the symbol pool; gain 100 gold coins per monster eliminated
Add 1 <color=#080909>Earth Elemental</color> to the symbol pool
Obtain 2 <color=#E74875>#Tools</color> symbols that you do not currently own
If there are 5 different <color=#E74875>#Humans</color> symbols in the symbol pool, obtain 1 <color=#AA2ABB>Paladin</color>
Eliminate 5 <color=#E74875>#Humans</color> from the symbol pool to get 10 random <color=#E74875>#Materials</color> symbols.
Get 2 random <color=#E74875>#Equipment</color> symbols. Gain 200 gold coins from the <color=#AA2ABB>Vampires</color> in the symbol pool and yourself.
Never appears in the mine. If there is a <color=#080909>Male Ninja</color> in the symbol pool, eliminate all <color=#147ED9>Zombies</color> from the symbol pool.
Never appears in the mine. If there is a <color=#080909>Female Ninja</color> in the symbol pool, eliminate all <color=#147ED9>Zombies</color> from the symbol pool at the start of each round.
+300 gold coins for the next gold gain. Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).
Gain an extra chance to select symbols. Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).
Settle the next gold gain twice (double the profit). Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).
Get an extra dice to use for the next roll (temporary +1 dice). Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up (eliminate yourself).
Eliminate half the number of symbols in the symbol pool.
Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Water Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.
Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Fire Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.
Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Thunder Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.
Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Ice Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.
Generate a random elemental other than the <color=#080909>Earth Elemental</color> into the symbol pool.
If there are <color=#E74875>#Tools</color> symbols in the symbol pool, remove yourself from the symbol pool and get 2 random <color=#E74875>#Materials</color> symbols.
Remove yourself and 1 <color=#080909>Cross</color> from the symbol pool, and generate a <color=#AA2ABB>God of Death</color> into the symbol pool.
Remove yourself from the symbol pool and randomly generate one of <color=#147ED9>Princess</color>, <color=#080909>Female Ninja</color> or <color=#080909>Nun</color> into the symbol pool.
Eliminate a random <color=#E74875>#Monster</color> from the symbol pool to get 50 gold coins.

Remove yourself from the symbol pool and randomly generate one of <color=#147ED9>Forest Fairy</color>, <color=#147ED9>Dark Moon Fairy</color> or <color=#147ED9>Starlight Fairy</color> into the symbol pool.
If there are <color=#080909>Female Ninja</color> or <color=#080909>Male Ninja</color> in the symbol pool, get an extra 30 gold coins.
Remove yourself from the symbol pool and generate a <color=#AA2ABB>Vampire</color> into the symbol pool.
Increase the base value of all future <color=#080909>Symbols</color> by 5.
Remove yourself from the symbol pool and generate a <color=#147ED9>Spaceship</color> into the symbol pool.
Eliminate yourself and get 2 random <color=#E74875>Materials</color> symbols.
Eliminate the <color=#080909>Werewolf</color> and yourself to get 100 gold coins.
50% chance to generate 1 <color=#080909>Flower Spirit</color> into the symbol pool, 50% chance to generate 1 <color=#147ED9>Zombie</color> into the symbol pool.
Eliminate 1 <color=#080909>Iron Chest</color> from the symbol pool to get 50 gold coins.
Eliminate 1 <color=#147ED9>Silver Chest</color> from the symbol pool to get 100 gold coins.
Eliminate a higher-level chest from the symbol pool (prioritize <color=#147ED9>Silver Chest</color>) to get double the gold coins of the chest.
Eliminate 3 <color=#080909>Flower Spirits</color> from the symbol pool to get 1 <color=#147ED9>Forest Fairy</color>.
Eliminate 2 <color=#E74875>#Humans</color> from the symbol pool to get 10 random <color=#E74875>#Tools</color> symbols.
Get 30 gold coins when dug up for the first time, 20 gold coins for the second time, decreasing by 10 each time until it reaches 0.
Randomly eliminate 1 symbol other than itself from the symbol pool to get 50 gold coins.
Randomly transform 1 symbol in the symbol pool into a <color=#E74875>#Monster</color> symbol.
If there is a <color=#AA2ABB>Gomora</color> in the symbol pool, eliminate the <color=#AA2ABB>Gomora</color> from the symbol pool to get 300 gold coins.
Permanently increase the number of <color=#AA2ABB>Dice</color> by 1. Removed from the symbol pool after being dug up.
Randomly generate 3~5 random symbols into the symbol pool.
When you have both Child and Merchant symbols, gain +5 coins per turn
If Vampire and Tie exist simultaneously in symbol pool, lose 50 coins at the start of each turn (triggers at round start)
Gain 1000 coins for the next 5 turns, but the game will forcefully end after 5 turns
If Werewolf and Hoe exist simultaneously in symbol pool, lose 20 coins each turn
If symbol pool has all five elements, gain 100 coins each turn
If Cross and Nun exist simultaneously in symbol pool, gain a Dragon Firearm (if not owned)
If Gomorrah, Zombie, Werewolf, and Vampire exist simultaneously in symbol pool, randomly eliminate half of symbols at the start of next turn and gain 2000 coins
If Ray Gun, Alien Helmet, Spaceship, and Mind Controller exist simultaneously in symbol pool, eliminate one human at the start of next turn and gain 300 coins
Infect one human into a zombie before each mining. Gain +20 coins for each zombie
All Human symbols gain +10 base value.
+50 coins per Human in pool on each spin.
Each round auto-fuse 2 normal materials into 1 rare.
Each round auto-fuse 2 rare materials into 1 epic.
If any die shows 1, gain an extra roll.
If any die shows 6, auto-mine all unopened tiles.
Mark a random tile as special; its earnings are doubled.
Mining the center tile grants +400 coins.
